item.title: 私人资本公司 CVC 称投资者对欧洲兴趣浓厚
item.description: 欧洲最大的私人资本公司之一 CVC Capital Partners Plc 预计，投资者对该地区的兴趣将继续高涨，尤其是在有限合伙人寻求从美国分散投资的情况下。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc, one of Europe’s largest private capital firms, expects investor interest in the region to remain elevated, especially as limited partners seek diversification away from the US.】

item.title: DeepSeek 目标年底发布人工智能代理，与 OpenAI 竞争
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，DeepSeek 正在开发一种具有更先进人工智能代理功能的人工智能模型，以便在这一技术的新领域与 OpenAI 等美国竞争对手展开竞争。【原文：DeepSeek is developing an artificial intelligence model with more advanced AI agent features to compete with US rivals like OpenAI in a newer frontier of the technology, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚新建住房项目减少，未售出住房增加
item.description: 今年上半年，马来西亚新建住宅项目急剧下降，而未售出的住宅单位数量却在增加，这凸显了房地产市场的疲软。【原文：Malaysia saw a sharp drop in new residential housing projects in the first half of this year, while the number of unsold residential units increased, underscoring weakness in the real estate market.】

item.title: 市场疲软后华尔街预计土耳其降息幅度较小
item.description: 在土耳其法院与主要反对党之间的摊牌愈演愈烈导致市场大跌之后，华尔街银行目前预计土耳其的降息步伐将放缓。【原文：Wall Street banks are now projecting slower interest-rate cuts in Turkey after the intensifying showdown between the country’s courts and the main opposition party resulted in a market selloff.】

item.title: Blackstone、道富将推出主动型欧洲 CLO ETF
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和道富投资管理公司 (State Street Investment Management) 将联手推出追踪欧洲抵押贷款债务的交易所交易基金，此举正值私募市场寻求扩大投资者基础之际。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and State Street Investment Management are joining forces to launch an exchange-traded fund tracking European collateralized loan obligations, a move that comes as private markets seek to widen their investor base.】

item.title: 简街在印度交易纠纷中令监管机构蒙羞
item.description: 数周以来，印度证券监管机构一直认为 Jane Street Group LLC 正在就其备受瞩目的市场操纵案进行合作。这家美国公司曾要求获得更多时间和文件，以准备 9 月份的听证会。然而，本周三，这家交易巨头提出上诉，令监管机构大跌眼镜。【原文：For weeks, India’s securities regulator believed Jane Street Group LLC was collaborating on its high-profile market manipulation case. The US firm had asked for more time and documents to prepare for a September hearing. Then, on Wednesday, the trading giant blindsided the authority by filing an appeal.】

item.title: 中国罕见的政策磋商引发有关经济和债券提振的讨论
item.description: 中国财政和货币政策制定者举行了一次罕见的会议，这引发了分析师们的猜测，即宽松措施即将出台，这将促进今年的债券市场和经济增长。【原文：A rare meeting of Chinese fiscal and monetary policymakers has prompted speculation among analysts that easing measures are on the cards that will bolster the bond market and economic growth this year.】

item.title: 关税带来增长风险，马来西亚维持利率不变
item.description: 马来西亚维持基准利率不变，因为央行正在权衡近期宽松政策的影响和美国关税带来的增长风险。【原文：Malaysia kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged as the central bank weighs the effects of a recent easing and growth risks posed by US tariffs.】

item.title: 美国就业报告公布前，货币对冲再次变得昂贵
item.description: 夏季过后，货币市场的套期保值成本正在上升，交易员们认为周五的关键性美国就业报告将带来更大的价格波动。【原文：The cost of hedging in the currency market is rising after the summer lull, with traders positioning for wider price swings around Friday’s key US jobs report.】

item.title: 摩根大通将于明年推出德国消费银行以推动增长
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co）计划从明年第二季度开始在德国提供零售银行业务，这标志着这家美国贷款机构在欧洲最大经济体的业务大幅扩展。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co plans to start offering retail banking in Germany from the second quarter of next year, marking a substantial expansion for the US lender in Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 牙买加总理霍尔内斯赢得选举，罕见地第三次连任
item.description: 牙买加总理安德鲁-霍尔内斯（Andrew Holness）赢得了罕见的第三次连任，因为选民们对他的政府在过去十年中减少债务、失业和犯罪率给予了奖励。【原文：Jamaican Prime Minister Andrew Holness won a rare third term as voters rewarded his administration for bringing down debt, unemployment and crime over the last decade.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率连续第三个月超过零，令瑞士央行松了一口气
item.description: 瑞士通胀率连续第三个月保持正值，这为政策制定者吃下了一颗定心丸，因为他们还要评估经济能否经受住美国关税的跳涨。【原文：Swiss inflation stayed positive for a third consecutive month, offering reassurance to policymakers as they also evaluate if the economy can weather a jump in US tariffs.】

item.title: 汇丰三年来首次出售 1,010 亿日元武士债券

item.title: 湿疹新药试验结果令人失望，赛诺菲业绩下滑
